name: dark-minimal
title: Oscar Hernandez
desc: A sleek and modern portfolio theme for developers, featuring a dark mode design, responsive layout, and customizable skill sections.
article:
Modern Developer Portfolio Theme

An elegant and professional design for software developers looking to showcase their expertise and skills. This theme includes:

  • Minimalist dark interface: Perfect for a clean and professional visual experience.
  • Standout typography: Modern, accessible fonts that prioritize clarity and aesthetics.
  • Support for modern technologies: Customizable icons and sections to highlight your tools and skills like Astro, React, TypeScript, and more.
  • Responsive design: Optimized for both desktop and mobile screens.
  • Intuitive interactivity: Smooth dropdown menus for sections like "What I Do?" to showcase areas of expertise.
  • Personalized touches: Unique details like animated code in the background for added visual impact.

Ideal for frontend developers and anyone seeking a sophisticated online presence.

github.name: Portfolio
github.description: Portfolio built with Astro, React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS.
